name: Stickman Archer: The Wizard Hero
description:
Stickman Archer: The Wizard Hero is an archery game where you face different enemies and bosses on different maps. collect money and improve your equipment or choose the best skills for your battles.

Features:

  • 150+ Levels to play.
  • 30 Suits that improve your stats.
  • 15 Weapons with different shots (some shoot faster).
  • 8 Minibosses and 8 bosses.
  • Increasing difficulty for each season.
  • Easy to play ideal for your free time. :D
